segments.text: The kitchen looks bright with daylight from the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains are pulled back, showing the neat garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, the sink faucet runs without stop.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's causing an overflow that drenches everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman dries her plate, oblivious to the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water streams down the cabinet doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron might get soaked soon too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are at the cabinet, up to mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on the wobbly stool, fishing for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He seems excited, arm deep in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But one wrong move and he'll tumble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're stealing treats right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could lead to slips or falls on the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm outside contrasts sharply with the indoor hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR
